Question: You are one step away from reaching the next level in an online game. What would you choose to accelerate your progress towards that goal?
Achiever: Pursuing higher rankings for better rewards
Explorer: Venturing into a new map in the game
Socializer: Collaborating with fellow players in a team

Question: What approach would you prefer to earn a free smartwatch from the fitness program organized by your community?
Achiever: To engage in daily workouts to advance in the fitness program
Explorer: To try a bootcamp with different fitness classes
Socializer: To join a fitness group to meet new people
Influencer: To recruit more members to join the fitness program

Question: Your favorite restaurant is offering a promotion. Which of the following activities would you choose to do in order to receive the giveaway?
Achiever: To beat the food eating challenge
Explorer: To try different dishes on the seasonal menu
Socializer: To bring a friend to dine in together
Influencer: To rate and review the food online

Question: When playing board games with your friends, which of the following options best describes your strategy?
Explorer: I learn the game rules as you go
Socializer: I cooperate with other players as much as possible
Influencer: I convince other players to adopt new rules for the game

Question: You participate in a lottery to win a pair of concert tickets featuring a popular band. What would you do to win the tickets?
Achiever: I would pass the band’s loyalty quiz
Explorer: I would listen to the band’s music from different time periods
Socializer: I would join the fanbase group online
Influencer: I would share organizer’s post on my social media

Question: When engaging in a new game for the very first time, which of the following options best reflects your approach to playing?
Achiever: I aim to advance to the next level first
Explorer: I navigate the game by trial and error
Socializer: I befriend other players to learn and make connections
Influencer: I share suggestions how to play the game

Question: When looking for a credit card, which of the following factors holds the highest importance to you?
Explorer: New and unique features of the card
Socializer: Ability to easily split bills with others
Influencer: An option to encourage businesses to adopt the card

Question: When coordinating an event, what matters most to you?
Achiever: That it is a sold-out event
Explorer: That it is a new experience

Question: Which of the following options would you choose when purchasing your favorite latest phone?
Least risk averse: Pay full amount to purchase the phone
More risk averse: Plan the monthly payment with your credit card with potential interest rate
Most risk averse: Commit a mobile plan for 3 years with zero down payment for the phone

Question: You just spent $80 on a buffet dinner and they gave you a 30-day voucher. What voucher option would motivate you to revisit the restaurant?
Most susceptible: One free cocktail from a top class bartender
More susceptible: Get 15% off an afternoon tea & pastries combo for minimum of 2 people
Less susceptible: Get $30 off the total bill with a minimum of 3 people at the table
Least susceptible: Not willing to revisit the restaurant within the next 30 days

Do you rent or own your house?
